mapper.select: select a.*, b.title topicTitle from pm_topic_reply a left join cm_topic b on a.topic_id = b.id where a.user_id = #{userId} order by a.id desc
select a.*, b.display_name displayName from pm_topic_reply a left join cm_user b on a.user_id = b.id where topic_id = #{topicId} order by adoption,id

select a.id, b.title, b.id topicId, c.id userId, c.display_name displayName, a.create_time, floor(a.number / 10 + 1) page from (select a.id, a.user_id, a.create_time, @rank := case when @topicId = a.topic_id then @rank + 1 else 0 end number, @topicId := a.topic_id topic_id from pm_topic_reply a, (select @rank := 0, @topicId := '') b order by topic_id, adoption, id) a left join cm_topic b on a.topic_id = b.id left join cm_user c on a.user_id = c.id where b.user_id = 1 and a.user_id != 1 order by a.id desc
